jd: From: sreekanth, 3ktechnologies sreekanth.k@3ktechnologies.com Reply to: sreekanth.k@3ktechnologies.com Hi ALL,Job Title: Java DeveloperLocation: Tallahassee, FL(From Day one onsite)Duration: Long TermDescription:other related field or equivalent work experience• Minimum of five (5) years of experience as a systems analyst on successful, enterprise level information technology projects• Work independently or cooperatively with other software developers and/or lead developer• Model and apply software engineering methods and techniques to the design, definition, development, evaluation, integration, and/or support of IT solutions• Perform analysis and successful troubleshooting of system defects and issues• Experience with business analysis to gather and document requirements• Experience creating test plans, test cases, and performance testing• Ability to code according to specifications with minimal defects to ensure quality results• Use defined procedures to configure, test and debug software• Assist with technology solution architecture design and installation• Experience in programming to adhere to ADA compliance in web applications• Experience in delivering projects in the agreed upon schedule, to the correct technical specifications, and within the approved budget• Excellent oral and written communication skills• Experience developing with: o JBoss EAP 7.0 and highero Java 8.0 and highero J2EE (JSP, EJB, JPA/Hibernate)o Java Frameworks like JSFo Primefaceso Oracle 12c and highero SQL stored procedures, triggers, views, etc.o JavaScripto VBScripto XML, XHTML, HTML5o CSSo JSON file formato REST API’s and Web ServicesThanksSreekanth.Technical Recruiter 3K Technologies, LLC www.3ktechnologies.com Sreekanth.k@3ktechnologies.com
